verbose_text: Unless otherwise indicated DMEM primed EPEC, which have elevated expression of the LEE / non-LEE virulence regulon, were prepared for macrophage infections as follows : overnight LB-grown cultures were diluted 1:50 into low-glucose (1000 mg/L) Dulbecco 's minimal Eagle media (DMEM) and grown statically for 3 h at 37degreesC in a humidified incubator with 5% CO 2.
